title.rendered: Out With Junk, In With Cash

content.rendered:
Need a little cash before your tax refund comes in this year? Maybe your current car leaves you worrying every time you turn on the ignition that it may not start. Maybe you have an old ride that has been squatting in the drive for way too long. Aero Auto Parts will give you cash on the spot for your junk car.

We’ll Take It As Is

Car won’t start? Bad transmission? Can’t get it here? No worries! Whether your car runs or not, we want it. Just think how one man’s trash is another man’s treasure. Our yard spans over many acres and has an ever-growing stock of cars, yours could be our newest addition!

We Pay High Prices

We have stayed in business for over 50 years because we value our customers and always try to give a fair deal. Even better we can also come to you the same day with our mobile pick-up services. We’ll pick up your car free of charge and offer you cash on the spot. We’re keeping it simple and stress free!

Getting Started

We pride ourselves in providing the best junk car service in Chicago, so make sure to consult us when it is time to sell your junk car. All you need is a valid vehicle title required for all sales. Call 773-483-2626 to schedule your junk car pickup, and we’ll take the hassle off of your hands.
